com.atakmap.android.util

Class FileCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.util.ReservationService<java.io.File>
      • com.atakmap.android.util.FileCache

  • public class FileCache
extends ReservationService<java.io.File>
    A ReservationService for a directory of files. Supports flushing of "stale" files. Files are "freshened" when they are reserved. Stale files are reserved during flushing, to avoid deletion of files that are in use.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.atakmap.android.util.ReservationService

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileCache

        public FileCache(java.io.File cacheDir)
        Creates a FileCache for the supplied directory. The directory will be created if it does not already exist.
        Parameters:
        cacheDir - The directory to use for the cache.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the supplied cacheDir is null, exists but is not a readable directory, or can't be created.

    • Method Detail

      • flushStaleCache

        public void flushStaleCache(long staleness)
        Expunges from the cache those files that were last accessed longer ago than the supplied "staleness," expressed in milliseconds. Files that are reserved are assumed to be fresh.
        Parameters:
        staleness - The maximum number of milliseconds ago a file must have been accessed to avoid being deleted from the cache.

      • getCachePath

        public java.lang.String getCachePath()

      • createReservation

        public ReservationService.Reservation<java.io.File> createReservation(java.io.File f)
        Description copied from class: ReservationService
        Creates a reservation containing the supplied item. Derived classes may override this method to perform additional work when a Reservation is created.
        Overrides:
        createReservation in class ReservationService<java.io.File>
        Parameters:
        f - The item being reserved.
        Returns:
        The Reservation token for the item.
